metadata.name: HolyGoat
metadata.description:
The goat is the second animal domesticated by humans after the dog. It is the first domestic animal that man ate from its meat and milk, and other uses such as guiding humans to find water in the mountains or making strong ropes from the animal's hair or making containers to store milk, yogurt, water Or oil from the skin of this animal was used.
The purpose of depicting this collection is to express the environmental catastrophe that has endangered the lives of these animals by humans through overhunting today.
